meta.description: MunchCoach is your AI-powered smart grocery list and recipe assistant.

home.title: Smart grocery list & AI recipes
home.description: MunchCoach is a smart grocery list and AI recipe assistant that turns your ingredients into personalized recipe ideas, helps reduce food waste, and keeps your pantry organised.

list.title: Your grocery list
list.description: Manage your grocery list and pantry in MunchCoach. Add ingredients, track what you have, and get recipe suggestions based on your ingredients.

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in to MunchCoach with Discord to sync your grocery list and pantry across devices.

hero.titlePart1: Turn leftovers into recipes with an
hero.description: MunchCoach keeps track of what you already have, suggests recipes with AI, and highlights what's missing so you never forget an ingredient again.

heroBullets.smartAwarenessBody: Track what's in your pantry in one place.
heroBullets.chatDiscoveryBody: Ask for recipe ideas and get answers in a familiar chat interface.

features.title: Cook smarter with what you already have
features.subtitle: MunchCoach helps you save time, reduce food waste, and make better use of the ingredients in your kitchen.

cards.saveTimeBody: Get personalized recipe suggestions based on the ingredients you already have at home.
cards.reduceWasteBody: Use up ingredients before they expire with recipe ideas tailored to your pantry.
cards.stayOrganizedBody: Keep a clean, always-available list that groups ingredients by category.
cards.neverForgetBody: See what's missing for a recipe and add it to your grocery list in one tap.
cards.discoverNewBody: Explore new recipes based on your preferences and what you have on hand.
cards.extraBenefitsBody: Know exactly what you can cook tonight without another supermarket run.

cta.title: Ready for a smarter grocery run?
cta.body: Start your shared list, ask MunchCoach for recipe ideas, and turn everyday ingredients into better meals.
